title: Beginner Teacher
additional-note: Another quarterly publication with the same name was published by the Church of the Nazarene from 1946 until sometime in the 1950s.  All of the renewed contributions to 'Beginner Teacher' noted in CCE or the registered works database, however, are by Mildred Speakes Edwards, who was closely involved with the Church of the Nazarene. We therefore presume that her contributions were to the Nazarene publication, and not this one.
